title: Slither
description: Slither is a Solidity static analysis framework written in Python 3. It runs a suite of vulnerability detectors, prints visual information about contract details, and provides an API to easily write custom analyses.

title: Manticor
description: Manticor is a high-performance Digital Derivatives Trading Platform that provides the features and products that are both expected and required by high-volume, institutional and other sophisticated traders.

title: Mythril
description: Mythril is a security analysis tool for Ethereum smart contracts.

title: OpenZepplin Defender
description: Automate your smart contract operations to deliver high-quality products faster with lower risk to users.
